columns.name: REGIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order group record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DT
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: The number of the contact

columns.name: LINKED_ORDER_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the link type for the patient order group's (TLG) source order group (OSQ) that represents a linked group.

columns.name: INST_OF_ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: Instant at which the contact was created.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: PROD_ACQ_TARGET_CELL_DOSE
columns.description: Stores the target product acquisition cell dose.

columns.name: PROD_ACQ_MIN_CELL_DOSE
columns.description: Stores the minimum product acquisition cell dose.

columns.name: PROD_ACQ_CELL_DOSE_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the units of the target and minimum cell doses for the product acquisition.

columns.name: PROD_ACQ_CELL_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The source of the cells of the product acquisition.

columns.name: COND_PALIFERMIN_YN
columns.description: Whether or not Palifermin is planned.

columns.name: COND_PLANNED_TOTAL_DOSE
columns.description: The Planned Total Dose (cGy) for the conditioning regimen.

columns.name: COND_SETTING_C_NAME
columns.description: The setting of the conditioning regimen.

columns.name: COND_INTENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The intent of the conditioning regimen.

columns.name: COND_RAD_FRACT_YN
columns.description: Whether or not Radiation Fractionate is planned.

columns.name: GVHD_OTHER_DRUG
columns.description: The free-text description for the other GVHD drug.

columns.name: COND_OTH_DRUG
columns.description: The free-text description for the other conditioning drug.

columns.name: PROD_ACQ_OTH_PROC_METHOD
columns.description: The free-text description for the other product process method.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant data was edited.
